title: Holy ghrazi rapier

properties.value: The Holy Ghrazi rapier is a Ghrazi rapier with a holy ornament kit attached to it. The ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add Saradominist aesthetics to the rapier.

Item ID25734

The Holy Ghrazi rapier is a Ghrazi rapier with a holy ornament kit attached to it. The ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add Saradominist aesthetics to the rapier.

While the rapier is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the ornament kit and tradeable rapier.

[[File:Holy ghrazi rapier detail.png|left|140px]]
The '''Holy Ghrazi rapier''' is a [[Ghrazi rapier]] with a [[holy ornament kit]] attached to it. The ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add [[Saradomin]]ist aesthetics to the rapier.

While the rapier is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the ornament kit and tradeable rapier.
